sense.name: elevated and slanting geological formation
sense.examples: The climbers will attempt the more difficult northern slope of the mountain. Rocks began tumbling down the slope after the earthquake. John was out skiing on the slopes all morning.

sense.name: mathematical gradient of a line or surface
sense.examples: The slope of these two graphs is not the same. The aircraft was on too steep a glide slope and had to correct its position. The slope of this roof will allow for proper drainage. Mary likes the backward slope of these modern chairs.
